articles.description: England captain Harry Kane says the 2026 Fifa World Cup may not be his last international tournament.
articles.title: Harry Kane: England captain looks to play on for country beyond 2026 World Cup

articles.description: Retiring superstar Rafael Nadal says he will not be distracted by emotion as Spain look to win the Davis Cup in the final tournament of his career.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal focused on Spain success in Davis Cup farewell

articles.description: Sergio Garcia is set to rejoin the DP World Tour for the 2025 season as he seeks to play at next year's Ryder Cup.
articles.title: Sergio Garcia set for DP World Tour return with 2025 Ryder Cup in New York a target

articles.description: Rory McIlroy’s tumultuous 2024 ends on the best possible note with a victory that should serve him well in his quest to end a decade-long barren run in the majors, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: 'Everything's worked out the way it was supposed to'

articles.description: Tottenham's Rodrigo Bentancur is given a seven-game domestic ban and fined £100,000 for using a racial slur about team-mate Son Heung-min.
articles.title: Rodrigo Bentancur: Tottenham midfielder banned for seven matches over racial slur about Son Heung-min

articles.description: The bond between GB's players is proving key in their winning run at the Billie Jean King Cup Finals in Malaga.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup: Emma Raducanu and Katie Boulter working together to lead Great Britain's pursuit of glory

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs lose their first game of the season at the Buffalo Bills while the Pittsburgh Steelers beat arch rivals the Baltimore Ravens and the Detroit Lions hit a half century.
articles.title: NFL Results & Week 11 recap: Bills end Chiefs run, Steelers beat Ravens & Lions run riot

articles.description: United States will be without forwards Trinity Rodman, Sophia Smith and Mallory Swanson for their forthcoming friendly with England.
articles.title: England v USA: Trinity Rodman, Sophia Smith and Mallory Swanson missing for Wembley friendly
